suffixMode.name: Suffix mode
suffixMode.desc: How to generate the suffix for image filenames

timestampFormat.name: Timestamp format
timestampFormat.desc: Choose a preset or custom format

customFormat.name: Custom format
customFormat.desc: Supports year, month, day, hour, minute, second tokens

autoRename.name: Auto-rename images from any source
autoRename.desc: Automatically rename images with generic names (Pasted image, Screenshot, etc.) when created from any source: drag & drop, Excalidraw, or other plugins.

suffixesToRemove.name: Suffixes to remove from note names
suffixesToRemove.desc: Comma-separated list of suffixes to strip from note names. Example: .excalidraw,.canvas (removes ".excalidraw" from "Drawing.excalidraw.md")

aggressiveSanitization.name: Aggressive filename sanitization
aggressiveSanitization.desc: When enabled, filenames are converted to URL-friendly format: lowercase, spaces → underscores, accents removed (é → e). When disabled, only invalid filesystem characters are removed. This applies to both pasted images and manual renames.

deletePrompt.name: Auto-delete prompt
deletePrompt.desc: When to prompt for deleting image files after removing links

notices.noImagesInNote: No images found in current note
notices.allImagesCorrect: All images are already correctly named!
notices.noOrphanedImages: No orphaned images found. Your vault is clean!
notices.autoRenameExistsError: Could not auto-rename "{{name}}" - a file with that name already exists. Right-click on the image to rename it manually.
notices.renamedWithErrors: Renamed {{success}}, failed {{failed}}. Check console for details.
notices.imageLinkNotFound: Image link not found in note: {{name}}

deleteImage.title: Delete image
deleteImage.linkedIn_one: This image is linked in {{count}} other note:
deleteImage.linkedIn_other: This image is linked in {{count}} other notes:
deleteImage.orphanPrompt: Image no longer linked. Delete file?

bulkRename.title: Bulk rename images
bulkRename.noImagesFound: No images found matching the filter.

orphanedImages.title: Orphaned images
orphanedImages.hint: These images are not linked from any note, canvas, or Excalidraw file.
orphanedImages.empty: No orphaned images found. Your vault is clean!

moveFolder.name: Move folder
moveFolder.desc: Folder to move orphaned images to

confirmDelete.title: Confirm deletion
confirmDelete.message_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} image?
confirmDelete.message_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} images?
confirmDelete.hint: Files will be moved to your system trash and can be recovered.
